author: Love Hotel
title: No Hay Paraguas Aquí
text: Yo quiero un trago largo de su coca cola
Yo quiero ver dónde vive y cuelga la ropa
I wanna long hard drink of your coca cola
I wanna see where you live
I wanna get to know ya
I wanna chip my tooth on your bittersweet
I know what you mean about kissing and bodies
Yo quiero juntar todos los pedacitos
De las cosas que rompían en mi otra vida
Quiero tirame debajo de sus pies
I know what you mean about kissing and bodies
I wanna know for sure
Are you a boy or are you a girl?
I came I saw I idolized
Your dreams they were hopes in disguise
You won't grow old you're beautiful so go so go so go
I came...
Yo quiero un trago largo de su coca cola...
I wanna know for sure
Are you a boy or are you a girl?
I wanna know for sure
